CustomField.description: Indicates in which stage the work order is in.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND( Service_Group__c=null , Group_Member__c =null),"New", IF(AND( Service_Group__c<>null , Group_Member__c =null),"Queued",IF(Group_Member__c <>null,"Assigned",'New')))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates in which stage the work order is in.
CustomField.label: Dispatch Status
